TypeSignature.Value: public class Timer : System.Web.UI.Control, System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler, System.Web.UI.IScriptControl
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Timer extends System.Web.UI.Control implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler, class System.Web.UI.IScriptControl
Public Class Timer Inherits Control Implements IPostBackEventHandler, IScriptControl
public ref class Timer : System::Web::UI::Control, System::Web::UI::IPostBackEventHandler, System::Web::UI::IScriptControl
type Timer = class inherit Control interface IPostBackEventHandler interface IScriptControl

summary.span: 依定義的間隔來執行非同步或同步 Web 網頁回傳。

span.span: Performs asynchronous or synchronous Web page postbacks at a defined interval.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 簡介Introduction 控制項可讓您指定的間隔執行回傳。The control enables you to perform postbacks at a specified interval. 當您使用控制的觸發程序控制項，控制項使用非同步、 部分頁面更新來更新。When you use the control as a trigger for an control, the control is updated by using an asynchronous, partial-page update. 您必須包含中使用的網頁物件控制項。You must include a object in a Web page to use the control. 您使用控制項來更新包含在計時器控制項控制項。You use the control to update an control by including the timer inside the control. 或者，您可以在其中放置外的計時器控制項並將計時器的觸發程序。Alternatively, you can place the timer outside the control and set the timer as a trigger. 您也可以藉由起始完整的 Web 網頁的完整回傳控制項在網頁中並不將它設定為觸發程序控制項。You can also initiate full postback of a complete Web page by including the control in the Web page and not setting it as a trigger for an control. 當計時器間隔已經耗盡所建立的事件處理常式時，您可以執行伺服器程式碼事件。You can run server code when the timer interval has elapsed by creating an event handler for the event. 在事件處理常式中，您可以包含的行為會動態調整的程式碼控制項。In the event handler, you can include code that dynamically adjusts the behavior of the control. 設定屬性來指定頻率回傳會發生。Set the property to specify how often postbacks will occur. 設定屬性可開啟開啟或關閉。Set the property to turn the on or off. > [!NOTE] > 當精確度至 Web 伺服器控制項文章取決於精確度的 ECMAScript (JavaScript)`window.setTimeout`瀏覽器中執行的函式。The accuracy of when the control posts back to the Web server depends on the accuracy of the ECMAScript (JavaScript) `window.setTimeout` function that is running in the browser. 屬性定義以毫秒為單位。The property is defined in milliseconds. 您必須設定屬性設為值，可讓至少一個非同步回傳完成下一次回傳起始之前。You must set the property to a value that lets at least one asynchronous postback complete before the next postback is initiated. 當控制超出控制項，計時器會繼續執行時的內容控制重新整理。When the control is outside an control, the timer continues to run while the content of the control is refreshed. 如果在處理一個回傳時起始新的回傳時，將會取消第一次回傳。If a new postback is initiated while an earlier postback is being processed, the first postback will be canceled. 預設值為 60,000 毫秒 （60 秒）。The default value is 60,000 milliseconds (60 seconds). > [!NOTE] > 新增具有較小的值，在控制項屬性可以產生大量的流量從 Web server。Adding a control with a small value in the property can generate significant traffic to and from the Web server. 使用控制項只視需要經常重新整理內容。Use the control to refresh the content only as often as necessary. ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下列範例所示顯示隨機產生的股票價格和時間的股票價格所產生的控制項。The following example shows an control that displays a randomly generated stock price and the time that the stock price was generated. 控制項的更新中的內容控制每隔 10 秒。The control updates the content in the control every 10 seconds. > [!NOTE] > 在此範例中，計時器間隔已設定為 10 秒，這樣當您執行範例時，您不需要等待很長的時間，以查看結果。In this example, the timer interval is set to 10 seconds so that when you run the example, you do not have to wait a long time to see the results. 每個計時器間隔造成回傳使網路流量，因為在實際執行應用程式中您應該將間隔設為適合您的應用程式的最長時間。Because each timer interval causes a postback that causes network traffic, in a production application you should set the interval to the longest time that is still practical for your application. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.Controls.Timer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.Controls.Timer/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.Controls.Timer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.Controls.Timer/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

Public Property Enabled As Boolean

member this.Enabled : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，以指出 控制項是否要在經過 屬性中所指定的毫秒數之後，來初始化對伺服器的回傳。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control initiates a postback to the server after the number of milliseconds specified in the property has elapsed.

value.span: 如果 將要初始化回傳作業，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if will initiate a postback; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性可開啟開啟和關閉的控制項。Use the property to turn the control on and off. 當您設定要`true`，則呈現網頁時，控制會開始倒數計時器。When you set to `true`, the control starts its timer countdown when the Web page is rendered. 在回傳時，您可以變更屬性值屬性及所做的變更將會反映在瀏覽器中呈現的網頁內容時。On postback, you can change property values in the property, and the changes will be reflected when the Web page content is rendered in the browser. 如果您變更屬性，然後將其變更回其原始值在相同的回傳，控制執行，因為如果有任何變更。If you change the property and then change it back to its original value during the same postback, the control runs as if no change had been made. ## Examples 下列範例所示顯示隨機產生的股票價格和時間的股票價格所產生的控制項。The following example shows an control that displays a randomly generated stock price and the time that the stock price was generated. 根據預設，控制項的更新中的內容控制每隔 10 秒。By default, the control updates the content in the control every 10 seconds. 使用者可以決定要更新的股票價格每隔 10 秒，每隔 60 秒，或完全沒有。The user can decide to update the stock price every 10 seconds, every 60 seconds, or not at all. 當使用者決定不更新的股價屬性設定為`false`。When the user decides not to update the stock price, the property is set to `false`. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.Controls.Timer.Interval#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.Controls.Timer.Interval/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.Controls.Timer.Interval#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.Controls.Timer.Interval/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

span.span: Retrieves properties from a object that are passed to the client component that implements timer logic in the browser.
An array of type .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會加入並屬性的執行個體類別物件。The method adds the and properties from an instance of the class to a object. 用戶端元件存取值，並將對應的值設定指令碼中。The client component accesses the values and sets the corresponding values in script.

summary.span: 取得或設定在初始化回傳之前所要等待的毫秒數。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of milliseconds to wait before initiating a postback.

value.span: 在初始化回傳之前所要等待的毫秒數。

span.span: The number of milliseconds to wait before initiating a postback.
The default value is 60,000 (60 seconds).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來設定頻率控制項啟始回傳至伺服器。Use the property to set how often the control initiates a postback to the server. 您可以變更的值回傳，例如內嵌的事件處理常式後的伺服器程式碼中的屬性事件。You can change the value of the property in server code after a postback, such as in an event handler for the event. 當精確度至 Web 伺服器控制項文章取決於精確度的 ECMAScript (JavaScript)`window.setTimeout`瀏覽器中執行的函式。The accuracy of when the control posts back to the Web server depends on the accuracy of the ECMAScript (JavaScript) `window.setTimeout` function that runs in the browser. > [!NOTE] > 設定屬性，以較小的值可以產生大量的流量從 Web server。Setting the property to a small value can generate significant traffic to and from the Web server. 使用控制項只視需要經常重新整理內容。Use the control to refresh the content only as often as necessary. 當您變更的值屬性，更新會轉譯時，會重設瀏覽器中執行的執行時間程式碼 ECMAScript。When you change the value of the property, the ECMAScript timing code running in the browser will be reset when the updates are rendered. ## Examples 下列範例所示顯示隨機產生的股票價格和時間的股票價格所產生的控制項。The following example shows an control that displays a randomly generated stock price and the time that the stock price was generated. 根據預設，控制項的更新中的內容控制每隔 10 秒。By default, the control updates the content in the control every 10 seconds. 使用者可以決定要更新的股票價格每隔 10 秒，每隔 60 秒，或完全沒有。The user can decide to update the stock price every 10 seconds, every 60 seconds, or not at all. 屬性設定為使用者的選擇。The property is set to the user's choice. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.Controls.Timer.Interval#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.Controls.Timer.Interval/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.Controls.Timer.Interval#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.Controls.Timer.Interval/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 超過 屬性中所指定的毫秒數，以及將頁面張貼至伺服器時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the number of milliseconds specified in the property has elapsed and the page is posted to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中指定的毫秒數時，會引發事件屬性已過，因為上次呈現網頁或自前一個事件。The event is raised when the number of milliseconds specified in the property has elapsed either since the Web page was last rendered or since the previous event. 處理時您必須先在每次回傳期間執行動作的事件。Handle the event when you have to perform actions during each postback. ## Examples 下列範例所示顯示隨機產生的股票價格和時間的股票價格所產生的控制項。The following example shows an control that displays a randomly generated stock price and the time that the stock price was generated. 控制項的更新中的內容控制每隔 10 秒。The control updates the content in the control every 10 seconds. 股票的價格和時間的處理常式中設定事件。The stock price and the time are set in a handler for the event. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.Controls.Timer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.Controls.Timer/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.Controls.Timer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.Controls.Timer/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

.property instance bool Visible
Public Overrides Property Visible As Boolean
public: virtual property bool Visible { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Visible : bool with get, set

summary.span: 覆寫 類別的 屬性，就不需設定此值。

span.span: Overrides the property of the class to prevent this value from being set.

value.span: 如果控制項會在頁面上呈現，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the control is rendered on the page; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Visible`屬性中覆寫以避免設定此屬性的類別。The `Visible` property is overridden in the class to prevent setting this property. `Visible`屬性會傳回`true`如果用戶端元件類別包含在網頁上，即使設定為`false`。The `Visible` property returns `true` if the client component of the class is included in the Web page, even if is set to `false`. `Visible`屬性會傳回`false`當它是容器中，例如控制項，其`Visible`屬性設定為`false`。The `Visible` property returns `false` when it is inside a container, such as an control, whose `Visible` property is set to `false`.

exception.span: 值會指派給 Visible 屬性。

span.span: A value is assigned to the Visible property.
